name: Ledenice
description:
For you, this is just small horror game... But for me, this is everyday reality. Hellcome in my hometown...

I tried to make experimental controls.... Sorry for that :D

Basic controls

Left, Right : Move
Up, Down: Look
SPACE : Use

Inventory controls

X : Inventory left hand
C : Inventory right hand
X + Up / Down: Pick up / Drop left hand
C +Up / Down : Pick up / Drop right hand
X + Space : Use thing in left hand
C + Space : Use thing in right hand
